channel.title: XP Rates for Skilling Help
channel.description:
Solved.
Ok so I know how to set XP rates on RSCD and everything is looking great as far as combat goes. I kill a man and get say 1k xp. That's fine. The problem is, I go and fish ONE shrimp and get 27k xp! The same problem happens when I cook this one shrimp. I get 32k xp! The problems are the same for mining, smithing, etc.
Can anyone help me with my problem? I'm not really sure what file to edit.

item.title: XP Rates for Skilling Help
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

If you want different rates for combat and non-combat skills then check the id, and have two modifiers for XP.

There are only very rare cases when you should be modifying the XML files.

Read full topic

item.title: XP Rates for Skilling Help
item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:
@Crooks wrote:

Edit your XP in the xml files…

Read full topic
